Text:
Heja!

Once again a big thank you for the latest release.
Seems I've fallen in love with that Replicants thingy. I know, you have put a lot of them in your MHRC, but could you also up that tremendous single album by the Replicants, Biomechanical?

I mean: Would you kindly? ;)
There's only one song left, then you have the whole album! :-)
Nice Dude (as always), Keep on Rockin ;P

Hello, Bio!

Please have a look at this:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Are_'Friends'_Electric%3F

Especially the part considering the covers done so far...
Just a little inspiration by Ophelia :)
